--- Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:

> AzureBlade: Right... I've played with you long enough...
> 
> In midair, he cut the main thrusters, switches to robot mode, and
> dives, sword first, towards Animus.
> 
> AzureBlade: Fear me... I am no Decepticon, no Autobot. I am the One
> who was crafted, forged, cast and assembled, the One who Slays. I am
> here to tell you, Minions, that you are not safe anymore. I am
> Protoform Z!
> 
> He was submerged by the energy flare. It engulfed him, but he
> continued. He was still whole, still deadly, and the spots where his
> armor had been worn were even already beginning to grow back. He was
> still thrusting with his sword, ready to spear Animus on it. His grin
> could have sent shivers down the circuits of even Ironhide...

Animus watched as the form of Azureblade broke through one of his
toughest attacks, healing his damage along the way. The expression on
Animus' face was one of dismay, frustration and perhaps even a little
fear. Animus stepped back a step as he did a mental swallow, thinking
that perhaps this battle might be more than he had bargained for. 

But as Azure approached, his long blade set out before him a calm
reslove spread over Animus' features. If he was to die, then he would
do so as a minion of Unicron, not as a fleeing simpleton! 

Animus set himself, waiting for Azure (or is that Protoform Z?) to
approach at high speed, at the last moment Animus fired a blinding beam
of light at Azure blade as Animus leaped into the air, thrusting down
with his sword at the same time, in the desperate hope that the
possibly blinded Azureblade would pass through and be vulnerable to
this attack!

Preston
(Animus)
